committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Coast Guard and Maritime Transportation

official_title: To require the transfer of certain Coast Guard property to the Traverse City Area Public School District in Traverse City, Michigan.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of Transportation (or other appropriate official) to expeditiously convey to the Traverse City Public School District, Traverse City, Michigan, all U.S. rights and interest in certain real property and related buildings, structures, and equipment in Traverse City. Provides a reversionary interest if such property ceases to be used by such school district.

titles.title: To require the transfer of certain Coast Guard property to the Traverse City Area Public School District in Traverse City, Michigan.
